en: Then the word of the Lord came to me:

ngiemboon: «Gù míŋ nyìŋ mesoŋ, sele shÿó gú, ńdíe pʉ̀a Amoŋ, júʼ nkʉ̀ gẅie é fóo mbwó mèŋ ńdɔg ńkága tuŋó yɔ́b.
en: “Son of man, face the Ammonites and prophesy against them.

ngiemboon: Gɔɔn né pɔ́b ngie pɔ́ zẅíʼte meshwóŋè mie mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé n gɔɔn né pɔ́b: Pi ka nyíŋe mesoŋ á na fʉ̀ʼ gie mé ka néŋe lɔ̌ʼ na jʉʼʉ Ndʉalʉ̌a yɔ́ɔn, á fʉ̀ʼ gie mé ka tága láʼ pa Ésàlayɛ, ńdɔg pʉ̀a pie é kɔ́ɔn ńtsẅé tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Yúndà, ńgʉa ńgÿo megàŋatsaŋá ncù.
en: Say to the Ammonites, ‘Hear the word of the Lord God: This is what the Lord God says: Because you said, “Aha! ”   about my sanctuary when it was desecrated, about the land of Israel when it was laid waste, and about the house of Judah when they went into exile,

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo n ge nyé pʉ̀a pie é sẅɛɛ menɔ̀ɔn, e fó sǎʼnèm ńtó, ńkẅé ngwòŋ gẅí. Pɔ́ ge gÿo tÿɔ́gɔ jʉʼʉ leneŋé sɔ́b á na tsetsáʼ gí, é nÿɔg mentàb mɔ́b wó. Pɔ́ zɔ ge gÿo cʉ́ʼ jÿó mentɔ̌ɔn tÿǒ mí, é piŋ núu mélêg gẅie aa gẅi.
en: therefore I am about to give you to the people of the east as a possession. They will set up their encampments and pitch their tents among you. They will eat your fruit and drink your milk.

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo sele Lamba, á tÿǒsoŋo gí yelÿò, é lɔg gÿo nkáʼ gẅie mekamɛɛ pfɛ́ɛ legǐ wó, é lɔgɔ láʼa Amoŋ ntsèm, é gÿo kìi menjʉ̀njÿò. À cʉa púʼu, pi cwoŋo ńzsé ngie mèŋ zɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: I will make Rabbah a pasture   for camels and Ammon a resting place for sheep. Then you will know that I am the Lord.

ngiemboon: Pi júʼu mmó gie mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé gɔɔn: Pi la púʼ mbwó, ńzɔb, ńzíŋ páʼ ngɔ́ʼ la kúu pa Ésàlayɛ. Pi la lɔg púʼu, ńnyɛ nzẅìŋ ngwág gie pi gẅiin nzèm pʉ̀a pɔ́ɔn.
en: “ ‘For this is what the Lord God says: Because you clapped your hands,   stamped your feet, and rejoiced over the land of Israel with wholehearted contempt,

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo n ge gÿo lɔgɔ pwó yɔ́ɔn, é gÿo nò na pi, é tsege gẅí, é náa mbwó meláʼ mendyɛ̀ʼɛ mie é ge gÿo túʼ shúm sí ntsèm. N ge gÿo gÿo epʉ̀a láʼ pí, e pú ḿmag, pi le gíŋ ńgẅiin ngwòŋ wɔ́. N ge gÿo pú pyága gẅí pɔ́ ntsèm. Pi leen ńké ńcwoŋo ńzsé ngie mèŋ zɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: therefore I am about to stretch out my hand against you   and give you as plunder to the nations. I will cut you off from the peoples and eliminate you from the countries. I will destroy you, and you will know that I am the Lord.

ngiemboon: Júʼu nò gie mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé gɔɔn: Epʉ̀a Mowab ka gɔɔn ngie pà Yúndà gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ tsɔ́ pʉ̀a pie ée tsɛ̀ɛ metsɔ́ meláʼ.
en: “ ‘This is what the Lord God says: Because Moab and Seir said,   “Look, the house of Judah is like all the other nations.”

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, n ge gÿo gÿo mé tág metÿǒsoŋ mie é táte pʉ̀a lékúu tsɛ̀ɛ láʼa Mowab. Mé ge gÿo pyága wɔ́b pɔ́ pà tàʼ pà tàʼ, mbɔɔ metÿǒsoŋ mie é sí páʼ Mbɛ́d-Yeshʉmɔd, pɔ́ Mbâa gie ee Mbaa-Mehoŋ, ńgÿo Kiliatayim.
en: Therefore I am about to expose Moab’s flank beginning with its   frontier cities, the splendor of the land: Beth-jeshimoth, Baal-meon,  # 25:9 Jr 48:23 and Kiriathaim.

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo gÿo pasẅɛ menɔ̀ɔn fó sǎʼnèm, ńtó ńkẅé láʼa Mowab, páʼ pɔ́ la tó ńkẅé ye Amoŋ. À gwɔ́ púʼu, à láʼ ńgwɔ́ na njÿó ye njÿê, mé le gíŋ ńkímte láʼa Mowab wɔ́.
en: I will give it along with Ammon to the people of the east as a possession, so that Ammon will not be remembered among the nations.

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo záʼ ntsaŋ pʉ̀a Mowab páʼ á ne ńzɛ́te, pɔ́ leen ńké ńcwoŋo ńzsé ngie mèŋ zɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: So I will execute judgments against Moab, and they will know that I am the Lord.

ngiemboon: Júʼu nò gie mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé ne ńgɔɔn: Epʉ̀a Éndɔ̀m la tsɔ́ʼ ndùndú ńná né pʉ̀a Yúndà, pɔ́ lɔg púʼu ńgwe ntsaŋ.
en: “ ‘This is what the Lord God says: Because Edom acted vengefully against the house of Judah   and incurred grievous guilt by taking revenge on them,

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé ne ńgɔɔn ngie: N ge gÿo lɔgɔ pwó yɔ́ɔn, é gÿo nò na pʉ̀a Éndɔ̀m, n ge gÿo zẅéte mbàŋa lâ menɔ̀ɔn pie ée wó, é sele tÿǒsoŋ léfó Temaŋ ńgʉa ńkúu Ndendaŋ, é lɔg gÿo nkùɔmekwaʼá, mé ge gÿo lɔg ncù, é zẅéte pʉ̀a pie é tsẅé wó.
en: therefore this is what the Lord God says: I will stretch out my hand against Edom and cut off both people and animals from it. I will make it a wasteland; they will fall by the sword from Teman to Dedan.

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo cʉ́me yɔɔn nò mbwó pa Ésàlayɛ, é pʉ̀a pɔ́ɔn: Pɔ́ zɔ̌ ge gÿo tsɔ́ʼ yɔɔn ndùndú, é ná né pʉ̀a Éndɔ̀m. Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ge gÿo záb ngɔ́ʼ twó pɔ́b, ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ máa gyáŋalóŋ yɔ́ɔn ne ńzɛ́te, é lɔg zíʼi wɔ́b mmó gie nyìŋ fʉa nò mbwó mèŋ, á gÿo yé. Mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé zɔ gɔɔn.
en: I will take my vengeance   on Edom through my people Israel, and they will deal with Edom according to my anger and wrath. So they will know my vengeance.

ngiemboon: Júʼu nò gie mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé gɔɔn: Epʉ̀a Filisi la gÿo yɔ́b kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ wɔ́ɔ pɔ́ lélɔg ńtsɔ́ʼ ndùndú. Pɔ́ la lɔgɔ máa gyáŋalóŋ ńtsɔ́ʼ ndùndú ńná né pʉ̀a pie é lɔ́ɔn ńtsẅé ḿbʉa wɔ́b pʉa, ḿbú ńzẅéte wɔ́b.
en: “ ‘This is what the Lord God says: Because the Philistines acted in vengeance and took revenge with deep contempt,   destroying because of their perpetual hatred,

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé shʉ̌ashʉa ńgɔɔn ngie: N ge lɔgɔ pwó yɔ́ɔn é gÿo nò na pɔ́b. N ge gÿo zẅéte wɔ́b ntsèm, epʉ̀a metsèm pie é la fó Kelɛd ńtó, ńgÿo jʉʼʉ leneŋé sɔ́b á shÿó ntse.
en: therefore this is what the Lord God says: I am about to stretch out my hand against the Philistines,   cutting off the Cherethites and wiping out what remains of the coastal peoples.  # 25:16 Lit the seacoast,# 25:16 1Sm 30:14; Zph 2:5

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo tsɔ́ʼ ndùndú yelÿò, é ná né pɔ́b, ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gie n ge lɔg cúɔ wɔ́b ge gwɔ́ wó tɛʼ. Pɔ́ leen ńké ńzsé ngie mèŋ zɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.»
en: I will execute severe vengeance against them with furious rebukes. They will know that I am the Lord    when I take my vengeance on them.’ ”
